description: This file defines a Java interface for the BaggageBeltRepository, which extends JpaRepository for BaggageBeltEntity objects, providing data access methods related to baggage belts, including a custom method to find a belt by its code.

classes.name: BaggageBeltRepository
classes.description: A repository interface providing persistence methods for BaggageBeltEntity objects, extending the JpaRepository to include CRUD operations and custom query methods.

methods.name: findByBeltCode
methods.description: Retrieves an Optional containing the BaggageBeltEntity matching the provided beltCode, or an empty Optional if not found.
